state_summary: Praxis Labs, a learning development platform, was acquired by Torch for an undisclosed amount. Co-founders Elise Smith and Heather Shen will join Torch as head of AI growth and head of AI product, respectively.
evidence: Secured a $15 million Series A back in 2021
Notable investors include Emerson Collective, Steph Curry's fund Penny Jar Capital, Precursor Ventures, and Ulu Ventures
keywords: AI leadership development platform acquisition Torch Praxis Labs
